ygData.messageBody:
All illusion type spells use divination.
Invisiblity qualifies as an illusion.

--- Kevin King <kevink@...> wrote:
> From: Kevin King <kevink@...>
>
> No, invisibility has the unfortunate trick of
> suddenly blinking you into
> sight with no warning. It's often been suggested
> that it have a flash
> warning.
>
> However, you cannot cast spells while invisible.
> So, even if there was a
> nice warning blink before your invisibility spell
> ran out, recasting
> invisibility wouldn't help very much in those
> unfortunate situations where
> you don't want to pop into view.
>
> Now, as to why it's a Divination spell...
>
> -- Magistris of Felwithe
